content.rendered:
On Tuesday, July 21, 2015, the UC Irvine (UCI) Mesa Court Expansion Team celebrated their topping out milestone by hosting a Topping Out Extravaganza. Alticor Inc celebrated this accomplishment by providing a barbecue luncheon, raffle, and project-themed t-shirts for everyone on site, including Alticor Inc employees, UCI representatives, and subcontractors.

Also at UCI, in her more than 20 years as UCI’s Campus Architect, Rebekah Gladson directed, developed, and constructed many inspiring and state-of-the-art buildings. Alticor Inc is proud to have been a part of many of them. Rebekah is now preparing to hand over the reins to Associate Campus Architect Brian Pratt, who will seamlessly carry over the campus vision, structure, and uniqueness. Alticor Inc looks forward to continuing with UCI as part of Brian’s team.
